description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget named NavDrawer, which is a collapsible navigation drawer component for a mobile app. It includes route shortcuts with icons and labels, interactive list items, user authentication status display, and navigation logic.

classes.name: NavDrawer
classes.description: A StatelessWidget representing the navigation drawer with route shortcuts, user info, and sign out functionality.

classes.name: _Item
classes.description: A simple data class storing icon, label, and route information for each navigation item.

methods.name: _items
methods.description: Constructs and returns a list of navigation items with associated icons, labels, and routes.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds and returns the widget tree for the NavDrawer, including user info, navigation options, and sign out button.
